title: AlarmRead (Method)
text:
METHOD AlarmRead
Notification, that the static part of an alarm has been read from the alarm storage.
The dynamic part of the alarm (i.e. the latch variables) will be passed by subsequent
calls to method LatchVariableRead

rows.Name: diWhichRow
rows.Comment: A 0-based index of the row read from TblAlarm

rows:
An AlarmStorageStaticData variable containing data of the
alarm
